text:
DailyRollingFileAppender no longer extends FileAppender, which breaks code which
depends upon this relationship.  DailyRollingFileAppender also lost several
public bean properties in the process.

Overall this is easy to work around -- and I have done so.  It could cause
heartache for those attempting to migrate 1.2 code and configurations from 1.2
to 1.3 -- heartache that may not be justified.
